message.content:
cs.SI, cs.SOC, cs.DS, cs.GT, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the problem of introducing an idea or product in a society and studying the propagation of positive and negative influences. This falls under the category of social networks and computational social science, which are covered by cs.SI and cs.SOC. The paper also generalizes a well-known economic model, which involves studying the behavior of people in different areas, and designing optimal spreading strategies. This involves the use of algorithms and computational techniques, which are covered by cs.DS and cs.AI. Finally, the paper considers the influence propagation phenomenon on arbitrary graphs, which falls under the category of graph theory, covered by cs.GT.
